stepper-question.by: Do you want to require attribution for your work?
stepper-question.nc: Do you want to prohibit others commercial use of your work?
stepper-question.nd: Do you want to prohibit others distributing your work if they remix, transform or build upon it?
stepper-question.sa: Do you want to prohibit sharing your work under other terms?

by.selected: Yes, anyone using my work must give me appropriate credit.
by.not-selected: No, anyone can use my work even without attribution.

nc.selected: Yes, others cannot use my work for commercial purposes.
nc.not-selected: No, others can use my work for commercial purposes.

nd.selected: Yes, others can use and share my work only as is, without modifications.
nd.not-selected: No, others may share modified version of your work.

sa.selected: Yes, anyone who changes your work must share their contributions under the same license as the original.
sa.not-selected: No, anyone who changes your work can distribute their contributions under a different license.

select-license-instructions: Use the most open license with attribution requirement, or select other options to restrict it.
selected-license-instructions: If you already know which license you need, just select it in the dropdown below.

license-description.common: allows others to share, distribute, remix, adapt, and build upon your work
license-description.nd: only the original work is shared
license-description.sa: the work is shared on the same conditions

license-dropdown-label: You can select the license you need in the dropdown below:

cc0.copyright-waive-statement: I hereby waive all copyright and related or neighboring rights together with all associated claims and causes of action with respect to this work to the extent possible under the law.
cc0.confirm: I have read and understand the terms and intended legal effect of CC0, and hereby voluntarily elect to apply it to this work.
